Utilities
---------

To pay your utilities bill, please click [here](https://www.municipalonlinepayments.com/annettatx) or click the blue bottom on the right hand side. 

​

Click through our tabs to find information regarding water, sewer, service, auto-draft form and engineering design.

Town of Annetta
---------------

P.O. Box 1150
